creditline: Gift of Mrs. John Crosby in memory of Mrs. Albert W. Hastings
description: hot water jug, pear shaped, with reeded handle and imitation Hall Marks; the rim of lid, the lip, and the handle-socket decorated in early die-work touched up by hand; inner part of lid double-plated by placing two plates back to back; inside lip plated in undetermined manner; heavily plated all over; inside is tinned
medium: Sheffield plate (silver fused to copper), rattan (replacement)
title: Hot water jug
